entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
